record.dc:title: 144BN13 Bridges Site 12BN13, Benton Co., Tennessee. Feature 10, Dog burial 12BN1. Showing dog burial in upper level. Square 26R2. Direction west.
record.wpa:narrative: This dog burial was found in the upper section of the deposit beneath the shell beds designated as Feature 7. The dog's body was oriented NE-SW with the head curled in toward its chest. Some disturbance had disarranged the rear of the body.
